translations: adj.反叛的；与现行社会秩序格格不入的

sentences.sentence: But this time there are no pantomime villains, like bolshy shop stewards or incompetent managers, to make sense of the narrative.
sentences.translation: 但是这次没有童话中的坏蛋，如反叛的售货员或是毫无能力的经理，使得故事的叙述变得有意义。

sentences.sentence: Teenager is at the sensible age, on the one hand, they are not mature enough, on the other hand, they are very bolshy, they don't listen to what their parent tell them, they will go against parents.
sentences.translation: 青少年处于一个敏感的年纪，一方面，他们还不够成熟，另一方面，他们很反叛，不听父母的话，和父母作对。
